T02TD2465E:141a-1: tsitta ratna bi sho dha n'am m'a rga lam /
T02TD2465E:141a-3: sems rin po che spyang ba'i lam 'bras /
T02TD2465E:141a-4: rje btsun mi pham mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2465E:141a-5: rnyed dka'i dal 'byor myur du 'jig / las dang de 'bras sdug bsngal yin //
T02TD2465E:141a-6: de spong shes rab snying rje bsgom //
T02TD2465E:141a-7: skyes gsum lam gyis don gsum thob //
T02TD2465E:141a-8: dam pa gsum gyis bsod nams bsags //
T02TD2465E:141a-9: rgya chen thabs kyis yang dag spel //
T02TD2465E:141a-10: shes rab zab mos rnam dag bya //
T02TD2465E:141a-11: zung 'jug bsngo bas rgyas gdab bo //
T02TD2465E:141a-12: kha che'i rigs las bal yul du sku 'khrungs pa'i pandi ta chen po dpal lnga rig pa'i mchog buddh'a shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa sems rin po che spyang ba'i lam 'bras zhes bya ba rdzogs so /
T02TD2465E:141a-14: // / mkhas pa chen po de nyid kyi spyan sngar lo ts'a ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bal yul yam 'gal gyi gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//
